2054.subject: HPWE
2054.descrlong: A theory and practical based course which addresses core concepts of both health and wellness, the interrelationship and benefits of physical fitness, proper nutrition, and effective stress management levels for young adults in college. The course places emphasis on self-assessments, development and implementation of personal wellness goals/plans/actions, and self-reflection on consequences of lifestyle choices. (Offered every semester.)
